page.title: 07PEPLOW CHURCH
page.content: The chapel of the Epiphany is a very small chapel which is part of Hodnet Parish; up until 1948 it was a private chapel belonging to Peplow Hall. Services are held on all the main Festival Days plus Evensong each 1st Sunday in the month, Choral Communion each 3rd Sunday and Family Service, with a bias towards the children, held when there is a 5th Sunday in the month. The church shares its Rector with Hodnet & Weston-under-Redcastle. Being a farming community the Harvest Festival service held in October is very well attended with numbers for ordinary services averaging less than 20. Most of the money needed to keep the church running has to be found through Fund Raising and Covenants.
